thought: To craft cyan_stained_glass, I first need to make cyan_dye. Cyan dye is made from blue_dye and green_dye. Green dye is made from cactus, so I'll start by smelting the cactus at slot 41 into an empty slot (eg., 12).
Ok
act: smelt from slot 41 to slot 12 with quantity 1
